@metadata.name: wikibase
@metadata.comment: The library is imported as default, it is "implied", and can be fully identified by the library prefix. This is nearly always named as "wikibase", so it is pretty safe to assume it can be used as prefix.

mw.wikibase 001.description: Returns the entity forthe current item, or the one with the entity id.

mw.wikibase 002.description:
Returns the entity for the current item, or the one with the entity id.
Alias for mw.wikibase.getEntity

mw.wikibase 003.description: Returns the entity id for the current page.

mw.wikibase 004.description: Returns the entity id for the linked title.

mw.wikibase 005.description: Returns the url for the current item, or the one with the entity id.

mw.wikibase 006.description: Returns the label for the current item, or the one with the entity id.

mw.wikibase 007.description: Returns the label and language for the current item, or the one with the entity id.

mw.wikibase 008.description: Returns the sitelink (page title) for the current item, or the one with the entity id.

mw.wikibase 009.description: Returns the description for the current item, or the one with the entity id.

mw.wikibase 010.description: Returns the description and language for the current item, or the one with the entity id.

mw.wikibase 011.description: Returns an escaped wikitext version of the snak.

mw.wikibase 012.description: Returns a rich wikitext version of the snak.

mw.wikibase 013.description: Returns escaped wikitext versions of the snaks.

mw.wikibase 014.description: Returns rich wikitext versions of the snaks.

mw.wikibase 015.description: Returns the property id for the property with the label or id.

mw.wikibase 016.description: Returns a table with properties given weights.

mw.wikibase 017.description: Returns a table with the property ids in sorted order.

mw.wikibase 018.description: Returns the best statements for the given entity and property id.

mw.wikibase 019.description: Returns the label for the instance, in the current or given language.

mw.wikibase 020.description: Returns the label and language for the instance, in the current or given language.

mw.wikibase 021.description: Returns the sitelink (page title) for the instance, for the current or given global site id.

mw.wikibase 022.description: Returns the description for the instance, in the current or given language.

mw.wikibase 023.description: Returns the description and language for the instance, in the current or given language.

mw.wikibase 024.description: Returns a table for the instance with all used property ids.

mw.wikibase 025.description: Returns the best statements for the instance, given the property id.

mw.wikibase 026.description: Returns an escaped wikitext version of the snak.

mw.wikibase 027.description: Returns a rich wikitext version of the snak.

mw.wikibase 028.description: A table that contains a map of all available claim ranks.
